description: Astilbe 'Alive and Kicking' is an amazing plant species. Its glossy, deep green, lacy foliage forms compact upright mounds of attractive foliage to add texture to the garden. It produces plumes of fragrant, feathery, pale-pink blooms in early summer and are great for adding a burst of color. It works well in borders, containers, and especially in shade gardens. It is deer resistant, drought-tolerant, and requires little maintenance. Astilbe plants live up to their name, thriving in moist, well-drained soils and lasting for many years with minimal care. The delicate flowers and attractive foliage of Alive and Kicking make it a great choice for any landscape.
